markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tenacious Net](/Feats.aspx?ID=5703) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tripkee" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=793" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 38 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Escaping your nets is no simple task. The [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) DC to [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=2375) or [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=2296) your nets increases from 16 to 18. After a creature you [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) with a net Escapes or Forces Open the net, stray strands of the net cling to the creature, causing them to remain [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) until the beginning of their next turn.
name: Tenacious Net

summary_markdown: Escaping your nets is no simple task.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Standard" > Tenacious Net Source Player Core 2 pg. 38 1.1 --- Escaping your nets is no simple task. The Athletics DC to Force Open or Escape your nets increases from 16 to 18. After a creature you grabbed with a net Escapes or Forces Open the net, stray strands of the net cling to the creature, causing them to remain off-guard until the beginning of their next turn.
